OUR STORY
Would you be open to a better way 
of seeing all the business and marketing options 
that exist today to help run your business … 
as it relates to knowing what to do and how to do it?

We created an INDEPENDENT RESEARCH FACILITY
that DOESN'T SELL any PRODUCTS or SERVICES.

Instead, we use our time and money to
research, decipher and validate all the
how-to tips, tricks and advice that
contractors are successfully using.

Contractors can access our 
online CONTRACTOR REFERENCE GUIDE to view 
all our findings in a step-by-step online database.

Our independence removes any hype,
sales pitches and hidden agendas
typically associated with sales reps.

We also remove the
confusion and information overload
associated with trying to figure out
WHAT TO DO (your options) and HOW TO DO IT … all DIY.

This, so you’re not always forced into hiring others to make your business more efficient, stronger and profitable (such as advertising agencies, marketing firms, web designers, etc).

The CONTRACTOR REFERENCE GUIDE contains insider opinions of construction, business and marketing, how-to tips, tricks, strategies, tactics, step-by-step instructions, articles, blogs, software recommendations, software tools, Word and PDF documents, security measures, procedures, charts, graphs, photo’s, SEO measures, screen captures, Excel spreadsheets, forms, examples, video tutorials, reading suggestions, reading materials &more.

HAVE THESE THOUGHTS
■ How and where can I advertise my business without a budget
■ Where can I get enough construction leads to bring on more crews
■ How can I expand my business to offer more services
■ How can I serve move communities for a larger market share
■ How can I eliminate headaches with better office & field systems
■ How can I delegate some duties so I can work on growing bigger
■ How can I create a great construction website and blog without hiring others
■ How can my website bring in construction leads so I don’t buy them and compete on price

    ME TOO
As a former successful contractor doing structural designs for 18 years in the design-build market while employed 23 people … our company hated the constant struggle of not knowing exactly WHAT TO DO, or HOW TO DO IT.

We were tired of pushy salesman who thought they knew our construction business better than we did. It seemed they only wanted our money verses helping us to see our options. We couldn’t afford lots of advertising, but yet we wanted to grow. 

OUR HOPE
Our thought to finding a solution was to find a lot of people willing to voluntarily share their knowledge, software and advice with us. The problem was that nobody was willing to share what they needed to make a living themselves.

WE OVERCAME
We created an INDEPENDENT RESEARCH FACILITY for Residential Contractors. Its purpose is to share unbiased information on hundreds of different business strategies and tactics that other contractors are having success with in growing their business. Our ‘Case Studies’ webpage gives nice examples of how contractors benefit.

NEW DAY
Because of our changed economy, new internet technologies and smarter younger competitors, contractors are being forced into a different mindset to attain higher, steadier incomes. 

Building a home requires hundreds of little steps to complete. Our team gives you peace of mind that you’re also doing everything possible in the office to achieve your dreams. Our efforts behind the scenes allow you to concentrate on doing what you do best.

CONCLUSION
None of us are getting any younger …
so the time to create a nest egg is quickly passing by.

We can’t promise to make you rich,
or find you an endless supply of leads,
or make all your problems magically go away …
only you can do that.

We can however, share the exact steps, technology and software
of what other contractors are having success with.

Knowing your options gives you better control.
Are you open to a different approach?

Jo van Riemsdijk & Kate Baird developed CX Talent Ltd after finding there was a huge need in the market for a dedicated Customer Experience recruitment service. ‘There is increasing proof that there is direct link between Customer satisfaction & profit, & yet Customer Experience is notoriously difficult to recruit for” says Jo van Riemsdijk. ‘Until recently, businesses have sought CX candidates from agencies who specialise in Digital Marketing, Call Centres, CRM specialists or General agencies, whilst there is undoubtedly an element of all of these under the umbrella of CX – there has been no one agency that dealt ONLY in the CX discipline. We received feedback from agencies & from the client side that finding the right candidates for their CX roles was difficult & time consuming. We offer a consultative approach, the more we understand about a company’s culture & ideals for Customer Experience & at what stage they are in achieving these ideals helps us to focus on the specific skills & experience that company needs. Once these have been agreed, we actively seek out candidates who meet those requirements'.

We saw that there was a need for both candidates with CX experience to be represented & assisted in their career progression in this area & also for businesses & their HR departments who have found it tough to source the right people. At CX Talent, we recognise that each company is at a different stage of development on their Customer Experience journey & dependent on where a business is on that journey from initial stages through to maturity & development, will decipher the type of candidate that that business really needs.

CX Talent represents a growing team of exceptional candidates. We think creatively about your Customer Experience requirements & with our consultative approach, pair your company’s business needs with those people who have the relevant skills & experience to drive your business forward.
